concept.title: Set a default transport
concept.shortdesc: To set a default transport protocol, pass it with the command with the --transport option.

conbody.p:
Available transports are:
ssh
winrm
local
docker
Pass the --transport option after the nodes list: bolt command run <COMMAND> --nodes win1 --transport winrm

This sets the transport protocol as the default for this command. If you set this option when running a plan, it is treated as the default transport for the entire plan run. Any nodes passed with transports in their URL or transports configured in inventory do not use this default.

This is useful on , so that you do not have to include the winrm transport for each node. To override the default transport, specify the protocol on a per-host basis: bolt command run facter --nodes win1,ssh://linux --transport winrm
If localhost is passed to --nodes when invoking , the local transport is used automatically. To avoid this behavior, prepend the target with the desired transport, for example ssh://localhost.
